education.title: M.S UX Design
education.body2: Key Coursework: Design Theory, Qualitative Research Methods, Cognition & HCI, User Experience Studio

education.title: B.S Computer Science
education.body2: Key Coursework: Human-Computer Interaction, Software Engineering, Network-Centric Computing, Computer Vision, Deep Learning

positions.title: User Experience Consultant
positions.body:
• Lead UX consultant for Science Gateways Community Institute projects undertaken at the DVC Lab (https://www.dvclab.net/). 
• Responsibilities include creating project plans, deliverables and timelines, conducting UX research to aid science gateway development and design.

positions.title: Design Engineer Intern
positions.body:
• Designed and implemented responsiveness for the OneSignal dashboard and website. 
• Created reusable and extendable Figma components for OneSignal’s Journey’s feature. 
• Updated previews for latest MacOS notifications on desktop.

positions.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
positions.body:
• Lecturing students on basic web development with HTML, CSS and Javascript. 
• Mentoring student course projects. 
 • Supervising and grading lab assignments.

positions.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
positions.body:
• Led effort to boost Google Lighthouse scores to 90+ for non-paywalled pages on Educative.io for increased SEO, performance and UX. 
• Implemented a custom caching mechanism through Cloudflare to decrease page load times and boost site UX. Resulted in 75% requests to be served from the cache in May 2021. 
• Worked in the technical design team to migrate the legacy design system to a modern framework (Tailwindcss). Implemented dark mode (most requested feature) which was possible due to migration.
 • Mentoring new-hires through the developer bootcamp. Revamped bootcamp documentation to reflect latest practices and ensure fluid onboarding.

positions.title: Technical Content Engineer
positions.body: Created 150+ interactive articles on various computer science concepts, algorithms, frameworks, libraries and technologies for Educative Answers.
